comments.body: Quote from: JJab0 on August 16, 2023, 01:04:01 PMHello,I am interested in this service and wanted to contact you via PM but your account doesn't allow messages from new accounts. Be careful with this user, he has a history of shady behavior and I have no doubt that he will scam you if you give him the chance.¬† There are legit companies out there that sell gift cards for bitcoin, you're much better off using one such service.
